site_name: Land At Southmere Village, Binsey Walk, Tavy Bridge, Southmere Drive And Mere Road Adjacent To Harrow Manorway And Yarnton Way, London.
description: Details of conditions 32 (BREEAM for commercial elements) pursuant to planning permission 16/01251/FULM for the demolition of existing buildings/hard standing, residential development of 525 units and 3691 sqm (GIA) of commercial floorspace with flexible uses across classes A1-A3 (retail, financial/professional services, caf√©/restaurants), B1a (office), D1 (Non-residential institutions) and D2 (Assembly and leisure) and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping; car & cycle parking; waste storage.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
